posts.post_title: T205 Graded 1-2 HOFs with Baker, Wallace, Duffy
posts.post_content:
Prices assume no fee method (add 3% for paypal goods).  Add $3 flat for shipping.

Bresnahan mouth closed PSA 1 - $60 
Duffy SGC 2 - $110 
Huggins SGC 2 - sold
Marquard PSA 2- $77 
McGraw SGC 1 - $48
Tinker PSA 1 - $62
Wallace with cap SGC 2 - sold
